questions.question: A type of layer in a Convolutional Neural Network responsible for feature extraction.
A pooling technique used in CNNs to reduce the spatial dimensions of the feature maps.
The type of data often used as input for Convolutional Neural Networks.
A deep learning architecture that excels at computer vision tasks.
A layer in a Convolutional Neural Network used to reduce overfitting.
The type of neural network layer that holds learnable weights in CNNs.
A function used in CNNs to introduce non-linearity.
A technique used to optimize the weights in a CNN during training.
